author: mpoeschl
msg: Seems the Torque is not quoting LONGVARCHAR's in any of the val.vm
templates.  This patch was created off of the val.vm from the MySQL profile.
However, val.vm appears to be generic enough that this patch could be
applied to all db's with no re-write.

author: jmcnally
msg: convenience method to get a log4j Category.  The category is based on
class name.  Log messages in classes extending BaseObject are likely to
be related to business logic and not related to torque.
